release_note: Fixed a bug that prevented the colors editor from showing up.
Import and export MD and OPML. Lock screen widget. Siri Shortcuts.
Added switch to use a separate zoom level for outline mode. Fixed preserving transparency for images added to the mind map. Update default map template. Added help section about keyboard shortcuts.
Customize map layout Customize maximum topic width height Rainbow color scheme Minimal edge style
New keyboard shortcuts for batch actions: styling text and setting task priorities Save and restore last used mode mind map or outline on a file basis Performance improvements opening big maps
Fixed crash when exporting map as PNG.

Open multiple maps and edit them using the keyboard. Export tasks as PDF checkboxes. Quickly add notes and links using the context menu. Quickly open recent maps by using the context menu on the back button. Open maps in place without copying them to Escape folder. Added setting for auto hiding the navigation bar.

Added switch for showing or hiding the outline indentation lines. Added context menus in the file browser. Fixed using the acquired features after the subscription ends. Fixed using the full screen button in the image picker for free tier users.
Fixed widget crash when hiding or showing Create Map button.

iOS 14 widget display your recent maps on the home screen. You can hide the Create Map button from the widget settings. Added feature to automatically cross off completed tasks. Added swipe back gesture from the map editor it helps navigating between maps on big screen iPhones.
Annotate images and draw sketches using Apple Pencil or your finger. Add pictures from Files. Preview images in full screen. This version requires iOS 13.4.
Set text style bold italic underline more. Copy and paste topic styles including colors and shapes.

Added a Today Widget and home screen shortcuts for quickly creating new maps and opening recent maps. Added option to duplicate file in file browser. Fixed bug clipping characters while editing topic text. Fixed restoring zoom scale when opening maps.
Improved precision when creating new topics by long press.

iPad Drag drop drag photos links and text from any app to your maps Pro Automatic task sorting Paste tasks from Notes import task lists from Notes including completion percentage Fixed flicker when quickly deleting the first lines of the topic text
Updated Help.
Outline Mode. Export as PNG and PDF. Batch operations. Black theme.
Added templates for creating new maps. Fixed bug crashing the app when dismissing newly created topics.
Updated help page. Added templates page link in Features map.
Fixed bug preventing saving dictated text under certain conditions. Fixed saving newlines in topic text. Fixed trashing files. Optimized saving big maps.

This is a big update containing the dark theme for iOS13 and dynamic types implementation. Dark theme Dynamic types app uses the preferred font size set at system level Fixed copy paste. Thank you for rating and reviewing Escape in App Store if you find it useful.

Added option to sort files by name or type. Bug fixes for iOS13. This version still uses light mode. Pasting topics copied from the app is mixing the topics and sometimes is crashing the app we are working on it.

Copy several pictures at once. Copy a topic using the context menu option and all the pictures contained in the branch are copied to pasteboard ready to be pasted in another app. Improved performance when opening large maps. Fixed undoing color change.
Fixed reading font sizes. Minor bug fixes.

Import OPML text files. Drop the files in iCloud Escape folder or open them from email and other applications. Spotlight integration. You can now search in Spotlight for your maps. Open a map once and then it is indexed in the search system. Handoff integration continue editing on other devices. Text is split by line when pasting on a topic and multiple children are created.

Mark topics as tasks and track their progress. Task icons priority and percentage are moved to the left of the topic and percentage icons are tappable for quickly checking completed tasks. Added square edges style for when you need more rigorosity. Added transparent color option. Improved animations. Fixed zoom glitches. Fixed font style compatibility with MindManager.

Enriched edge styles with thickness options. Check More Options screen in map editor. Revamped map look and layout. Improved zooming double tap on canvas to zoom out. Improved compatibility with MindManager. Load org chart tree and timeline style maps. Preserve position for manually arranged topics.
Fix for pasting picture topics.
Now you can paste pictures on topics and on the topic editor. Copy or share pictures from the topic editor. Added recent files screen. Improved iCloud synchronization.
Save last colour when switching colour pickers. Bug fixes.
